backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profile management with access control plus enquiry storage and retrieval with ID-based records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing all frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuration defining root layout and routes for home, courses, about, and contact pages.
Simple wrapper component providing a minimum-height layout.
Footer showing branding, navigation links, course categories, and institute contact details.
Header with logo, navigation links, and mobile sheet menu plus an enquiry button.
frontend/src/content/coursesCatalog.ts: Structured course catalog defining categories with descriptions, colors, and course lists.
frontend/src/content/instituteDetails.ts: Exports static institute contact and location details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and triggers query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit enquiries to the backend and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and institute offerings.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and enquiry submission plus displays institute contact info.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays course categories and course cards sourced from the courses catalog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, feature highlights, and links to courses and contact sections using Tailwind and custom UI components.
frontend/src/utils/courseCategoryMapping: Maps string category names to typed CourseCategory variants or null if unsupported.
frontend/src/utils/enquiryValidation.ts: Validates enquiry form fields, returning error messages for invalid name, phone, email, or message inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and notes describing the SMART DESK websiteâ€™s state and features.
